_comment: Created by NCODowd on 07/07/2016 12:50:39 using v2.7
title: How have trusts breaching the 8 minute target for Red 1 and 2 calls changed over time?
analysis_commentary: This graph shows that in most months when there is a breach of the eight minute response target nationally, there is a corresponding breach in more than half of ambulance trusts. This suggests that a breach of the national target is due to common factors across areas rather than just poorer performance in a few outlier trusts.
